Utils Module

Module with utility functions for data conversion.

pyAdmin.utils.bytes_to_gb(bytes_value: int) → float[source]

Convert bytes to gigabytes.

Parameters:

bytes_value (int) – Value in bytes.

Returns:

Value converted to gigabytes (rounded to 2 decimal places).

Return type:

float
